mapper.insert: insert into shop (shop_owner, shop_number, shop_name, shop_addr, shop_tel, shop_auth, mem_seq, shop_time, shop_photo, shop_etc, shop_small_price, shop_medium_price, shop_large_price, shop_content) values (#{shop_owner}, #{shop_number}, #{shop_name}, #{shop_addr}, #{shop_tel}, 0, #{mem_seq}, #{shop_time}, #{shop_photo}, #{shop_etc}, #{shop_small_price}, #{shop_medium_price}, #{shop_large_price}, #{shop_content})
mapper.select:
select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, shop_seq, shop_owner, shop_number, shop_name, shop_addr, shop_tel, shop_auth, mem_seq, shop_time, shop_photo, shop_etc, shop_small_price, shop_medium_price, shop_large_price, shop_content from shop where (@rownum:=0)=0 and shop_auth=1
and shop_addr like concat('%',#{shopAddrSeo},'%')
and shop_addr like concat('%',#{shopAddrKyeong},'%')
and not shop_addr like concat('%',#{shopAddrSeo},'%') and not shop_addr like concat('%',#{shopAddrKyeong},'%')
order by shop_seq desc limit #{start}, #{recordCountPerPage}

select count(*) from shop where shop_auth=1
and shop_addr like concat('%',#{shopAddrSeo},'%')
and shop_addr like concat('%',#{shopAddrKyeong},'%')
and not shop_addr like concat('%',#{shopAddrSeo},'%') and not shop_addr like concat('%',#{shopAddrKyeong},'%')

select shop_seq, shop_owner, shop_number, shop_name, shop_addr, shop_tel, shop_auth, mem_seq, shop_time, shop_photo, shop_etc, shop_small_price, shop_medium_price, shop_large_price, shop_content from shop where mem_seq = #{mem_seq}
select shop_seq, design_seq, design_price, design_name, design_time, design_auth from shop_designer where shop_seq = #{shop_seq} and design_auth=0
select shop_resv_time from shop_reservation where shop_seq=#{shop_seq} and design_seq=#{design_seq} and shop_resv_rday=#{shop_resv_rday} and shop_resv_auth=0
mapper.insert: insert into shop_designer (shop_seq, design_price, design_name, design_time, design_auth) values(#{shop_seq}, #{design_price}, #{design_name}, #{design_time}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from shop_designer where design_seq = #{design_seq}

select shop_seq, shop_owner, shop_number, shop_name, shop_addr, shop_tel, shop_auth, mem_seq, shop_time, shop_photo, shop_etc, shop_small_price, shop_medium_price, shop_large_price, shop_content from shop where shop_seq = #{shop_seq}
select count(shop_resv_rday) from shop_reservation where shop_seq=#{shop_seq} and design_seq=#{design_seq} and shop_resv_auth=0 and shop_resv_rday >= curdate()
select count(design_seq) from shop_designer where shop_seq=#{shop_seq} and design_auth=0
mapper.insert: insert into shop_reservation (shop_seq, design_seq, mem_seq, shop_resv_time, shop_resv_rday, shop_resv_day,shop_resv_size, shop_resv_name, shop_resv_tel,shop_resv_price, shop_resv_auth, shop_resv_comment) values(#{shop_seq}, #{design_seq}, #{mem_seq}, #{shop_resv_time}, #{shop_resv_rday}, now(), #{shop_resv_size}, #{shop_resv_name}, #{shop_resv_tel}, #{shop_resv_price}, 0, #{shop_resv_comment})
mapper.select: select * from shop_reservation where shop_resv_seq=#{shop_resv_seq}

select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, r.*, s.shop_name, s.shop_addr, s.shop_tel, s.shop_time, s.shop_photo, d.design_name from shop_reservation r join shop s on r.shop_seq = s.shop_seq join shop_designer d on r.design_seq = d.design_seq where (@rownum:=0)=0 and shop_resv_auth=0 and r.mem_seq=#{mem_seq} order by shop_resv_rday asc limit #{start},#{recordCountPerPage}

select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, r.*, s.shop_name, s.shop_addr, s.shop_tel, s.shop_time, s.shop_photo, d.design_name from shop_reservation r join shop s on r.shop_seq = s.shop_seq join shop_designer d on r.design_seq = d.design_seq where (@rownum:=0)=0 and shop_resv_auth=1 and r.mem_seq=#{mem_seq} order by shop_resv_rday asc limit #{start},#{recordCountPerPage}
select ifnull(count(*),0) from shop_reservation where shop_resv_auth=0 and mem_seq=#{mem_seq}
select ifnull(count(*),0) from shop_reservation where shop_resv_auth=1 and mem_seq=#{mem_seq}

select r.*,d.design_name, s.shop_name, s.shop_addr, s.shop_tel, s.shop_time, s.shop_photo, s.mem_seq as seller_seq from shop_reservation r join shop s on r.shop_seq = s.shop_seq join shop_designer d on r.design_seq = d.design_seq where r.shop_resv_seq = #{shop_resv_seq}
